/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV015QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT AUD_YR ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 ,STTC_COL5 ,STTC_COL6 ,STTC_COL7 ,STTC_COL8 ,STTC_COL9 ,STTC_COL10 ,STTC_COL11 ,STTC_COL12 ,ROW_KND_CD ,VIEW_YN FROM ( SELECT ENF_YR AS AUD_YR ,CASE WHEN ENF_YR IS NULL THEN '총계' WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD IS NULL THEN ENF_YR || '년 합계' WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='1' THEN '국가기관' WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='2' THEN '지방자치단체' WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='3' THEN '공공기관' WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='4' THEN '기타단체' END AS STTC_TIT1 ,CNT_1 + CNT_2 + CNT_3 + CNT_4 + CNT_5 AS STTC_COL1 ,PSON_1 + PSON_2 + PSON_3 + PSON_4 + PSON_5 AS STTC_COL2 ,CNT_1 AS STTC_COL3 ,PSON_1 AS STTC_COL4 ,CNT_2 AS STTC_COL5 ,PSON_2 AS STTC_COL6 ,CNT_3 AS STTC_COL7 ,PSON_3 AS STTC_COL8 ,CNT_4 AS STTC_COL9 ,PSON_4 AS STTC_COL10 ,CNT_5 AS STTC_COL11 ,PSON_5 AS STTC_COL12 ,NVL(ORG_DVSN_CD, '0') AS ROW_KND_CD ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) - 1 > ENF_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(DETAIL.ENF_DT,0,4) AS ENF_YR ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER.ORG_DVSN_CD, 1, 1) = '1' THEN '1' WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER.ORG_DVSN_CD, 1, 1) = '2' THEN '2' WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER.ORG_DVSN_CD, 1, 1) = '3' THEN '3' ELSE '4' END AS ORG_DVSN_CD ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '810' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_1 /* 예산절감 */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '810' THEN DETAIL.NOP_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PSON_1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '820' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_2 /* 업무개선 */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '820' THEN DETAIL.NOP_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PSON_2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '830' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_3 /* 성실근무 */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '830' THEN DETAIL.NOP_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PSON_3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '840' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_4 /* 민원해소 */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '840' THEN DETAIL.NOP_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PSON_4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '850' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CNT_5 /* 기타 */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD = '850' THEN DETAIL.NOP_CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PSON_5 FROM TBBADEAR002D DETAIL ,TBBADEAR001M MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND MASTER.AUD_YR = DETAIL.AUD_YR AND MASTER.AUD_NO = DETAIL.AUD_NO AND MASTER.DSP_RQ_SNO = DETAIL.DSP_RQ_SNO AND MASTER.DSP_RQ_KND_CD IN ('810','820','830','840','850') AND DETAIL.ENF_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 'YYYY')||'-01-01') AND LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1)) AND DETAIL.DTM_STA_CD != '0' GROUP BY ROLLUP(SUBSTR(DETAIL.ENF_DT, 0, 4) ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER.ORG_DVSN_CD, 1, 1) = '1' THEN '1' WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER.ORG_DVSN_CD, 1, 1) = '2' THEN '2' WHEN SUBSTR(MASTER.ORG_DVSN_CD, 1, 1) = '3' THEN '3' ELSE '4' END) ) WHERE ENF_YR IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ENF_YR DESC ,CASE WHEN ENF_YR IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD IS NULL THEN 2 WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='1' THEN 3 WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='2' THEN 4 WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='3' THEN 5 WHEN ORG_DVSN_CD ='4' THEN 6 END) UNION ALL SELECT AUD_YR ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 ,STTC_COL5 ,STTC_COL6 ,STTC_COL7 ,STTC_COL8 ,STTC_COL9 ,STTC_COL10 ,STTC_COL11 ,STTC_COL12 ,ROW_KND_CD ,VIEW_YN FROM ( SELECT T2.AUD_YR ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 ,T2.STTC_COL5 ,T2.STTC_COL6 ,T2.STTC_COL7 ,T2.STTC_COL8 ,T2.STTC_COL9 ,T2.STTC_COL10 ,T2.STTC_COL11 ,T2.STTC_COL12 ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '01' AND T2.AUD_YR = (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T2.AUD_YR)-1) FROM TWFAACAV200D T2 WHERE T2.STTC_CLSF_CD = '014' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '014' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'N' WHEN T1.STTC_YR > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '015' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '015' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL) AND T2.AUD_YR BETWEEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -49),0,4) AND SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt},-13),0,4) ORDER BY AUD_YR DESC ,CASE WHEN AUD_YR IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN ROW_KND_CD ='0' THEN 2 WHEN ROW_KND_CD ='1' THEN 3 WHEN ROW_KND_CD ='2' THEN 4 WHEN ROW_KND_CD ='3' THEN 5 WHEN ROW_KND_CD ='4' THEN 6 END)

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV015QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 ,T2.STTC_COL5 ,T2.STTC_COL6 ,T2.STTC_COL7 ,T2.STTC_COL8 ,T2.STTC_COL9 ,T2.STTC_COL10 ,T2.STTC_COL11 ,T2.STTC_COL12 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 1 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '015' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV015QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'015' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '015' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) ,'01' ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1)), 'MM') ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
